turkish_example_sentence: Onlar samimi özürlerini arkadaşlarına demiş olsalardı kavga bitmişti
english_example_sentence: If they had said their sincere apologies to their friends, the fight would have ended
russian_example_sentence: Если бы они сказали свои искренние извинения своим друзьям, ссора бы закончилась
